EmailTemplate.name: Webinar Response - EIM Time Webinar
EmailTemplate.subject: EIM Time Webinar
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
{!Lead.FirstName} {!Lead.LastName}:
Thank you for registering for the EIM Time Webinar. Date: Wednesday, April 1 Time: 11 am Pacific / 2 pm Eastern
Video:
Conference URL: http://e-meetings.mci.com/nc/join.php?i=SV56561&p=time&t=c Conference/Meeting Number: SV56561 Conference/Meeting Passcode: Time
Audio:
Conference Audio Dial In: 800-369-3357 (give operator the passcode: "Time" and conference leader's name: "Eldean Ward")
Please log in and dial the conference audio line 10 minutes prior to the start time.
